title: Loft
occurrences: Where was he calling from? - The loft. I had to come right away.
There's a loft on the top floor of that building.
That's odd. We have information that you and your friends share that loft.
The lift is impressive but I thought we were here to see the loft.
You have to pay them? - Why would we rent a loft here?
Great voicemail message too: 'There's a stiff in the loft.'
If you accept this key, you also accept the rules of the loft.
The loft is finished. Check it out. It's my gift to all of you.
Guys, our very own loft.
In Holland there's a loft, in Holland there's a loft.
The Latin saying... and the knife. All of it right here in our loft.
Whose loft is this, by the way?
Did you take her to the loft? - No, it happened in Dusseldorf.
You also have a key. Or do you only go to the loft to do the dishes?
Someone put the loft up for sale. - I told you, didn't I?
Who is that? And who decided to sell the loft?
And that still doesn't explain why our loft was put up for sale.
How many women did you take to that loft? You and your friends?
Does your wife know you share a loft with your friends?
I don't share a loft with my friends. - Did you know the girl?
Why meet an estate agent to sell a loft that's not hers?
Does Annette know about this loft? - No, it happened in Dusseldorf.
Let's meet tomorrow in the loft.
That's why we have to keep denying we share this loft.
Impossible. We spent a whole hour together at the loft. Where is Tom?
He was at the loft this morning.
